resources.string:
It's a little game ported and fine-tuned to be played on an Android Wear Device. The Android Wear App should have silently installed RollDice on your Wearable when you've installed this App on your Smartphone.

You can find the code of RollDice here:
http://www.github.com/cyrilleguipie/RollDice

Pro-Tip: Click the blue bubble on the left to start RollDice on your Wearable. Alternative use the "OK Google, Start RollDice" Voice Command on your Wearable.

Blog:
http://cyrilleguipie.blogspot.com
